Proverb: It does not matter how slowly you go, so long as you do not stop

Proverb: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backward. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future. Proverb: Everything you can imagine is real

Proverb: Our greatest fear should not be of failure... but of succeeding at things in life that don't really matter

Proverb: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.

Proverb: Defeat is a state of mind; No one is ever defeated until defeat has been accepted as a reality.

Proverb: Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.

Proverb: Absorb what is useful, discard what is not, add what is uniquely your own.

Author: bruce lee
Proverb: To hell with circumstances; I create opportunities.

Author: bruce lee
Proverb: If you always put limits on everything you do, physical or anything else, it will spread into your work and into your life. There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
